overview: Collection of five short films from Starline Films. "Horny, Hot And Wild" (a.k.a. "Joey's Buddy") — Joey is a hot blooded young stud who enjoys totally dominating his partner. "Can't Get Enough" — Rick and Brad are two great looking young guys who seem to be constantly looking for new sensual thrills. "Hard Drive" (a.k.a. "Indian Boy") — Chuck is a handsome Indian boy who is turned on by ramming his big cock into a passively unwilling partner. "Young Fantasies" (a.k.a. "Get It On," "Tasting Bob") — Bob decides it's time for some action, since he has had his eye on Larry for some time now. "Hard On Love" — What happens when a young, hot-blooded, well-hung blonde like Gregg meets a horny, olive-skinned young dude?
title: Hard Drive
